item.title: Mega Jackpot, Mega Problems
item.description: In case you’ve missed the news, the Powerball jackpot is now up to $1.5 billion. That’s BILLION with a B. $1,500,000,000. Yowzer!!! That’s a lot of money. Life altering money. And yet, it won’t change a thing. Every single one of you reading this who decides to play won’t win. I can safely say that given that the odds of winning are 1 in 292 million. For whoever does win, problems will come with it.
